metadata.title: Clipwise - Turn Long Videos Into Viral Shorts
metadata.description: AI-powered video editor that converts long-form videos into engaging vertical clips for TikTok, Instagram Reels, and YouTube Shorts. Start your 7-day trial today.

hero.headline: Turn Long Videos Into Viral Shorts in Minutes

items.title: Batch Processing

items.title: YouTube Integration
items.description: Paste any YouTube URL and we'll download and process it automatically.

items.title: Maximize Your Content ROI
items.description: Repurpose long YouTube videos, podcasts, or streams into 10+ short clips. Save hours of editing time and grow your audience across multiple platforms.

items.title: Scale Your Social Media Presence
items.description: Turn webinars, product demos, and interviews into share-worthy content. Keep your social feeds active without hiring a full-time video editor.

items.title: Deliver More Value to Clients
items.description: Process multiple client videos efficiently with bulk export and custom branding. Scale your video production without scaling your team.

items.question: Can I cancel anytime?
items.answer: Yes. No contracts, no fine print.

items.question: What happens if I run out of minutes?
items.answer: You can upgrade your plan or purchase additional minutes.

items.question: Is there an annual discount?
items.answer: Yes. Save up to 25% when paying annually.

items.question: Does the trial have a watermark?
items.answer: No. We want you to try the real product.

finalCta.headline: Turn your long videos into viral clips in minutes
finalCta.subheadline: Start today with a free trial

faq.headline: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subheadline: Everything you need to know about Clipwise

items.question: How does the 7-day trial work?
items.answer: Sign up with your credit card and get 7 days of full access to all features. You can process up to 30 minutes of video and generate up to 10 clips. Cancel anytime before the trial ends and you won't be charged.

items.question: What video formats do you support?
items.answer: We support all major video formats including MP4, MOV, AVI, MKV, and more. You can also paste YouTube URLs and we'll download and process them automatically.

items.question: How long does video processing take?
items.answer: Most videos are processed in 5-10 minutes depending on length and plan. Pro and Business plans get priority processing for faster turnaround.

items.question: How accurate are the AI-generated captions?
items.answer: Our Whisper v3 powered transcription achieves 95%+ accuracy with word-level timestamps. You can also edit captions before exporting if needed.

items.question: Can I edit the clips after generation?
items.answer: Yes! You can adjust clip timing, edit captions, customize branding, and apply templates before exporting your final clips.

items.question: What's your refund policy?
items.answer: We offer a 7-day money-back guarantee on all paid plans. If you're not satisfied, contact us within 7 days of purchase for a full refund.

items.question: What's the maximum video length?
items.answer: You can upload videos up to 60 minutes in length. Longer videos may be supported on Enterprise plans - contact us for details.

items.question: How does usage billing work?
items.answer: We track the total minutes of video you process each month. If you exceed your plan's limit, you can upgrade or purchase additional minutes. Unused minutes don't roll over.
